translations: [纺]线；线程（thread 的复数）；相关串连
穿线于；穿过（thread 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: The screw threads will be able to get a good grip.
sentences.translation: 这些螺纹可以咬合得很紧。

sentences.sentence: The author skilfully draws together the different threads of the plot.
sentences.translation: 作者娴熟地把情节的各种线索串联在一起。

sentences.sentence: This rope is twisted from many threads.
sentences.translation: 这根绳子是由许多线搓合而成的。
